title: Where Is Cub?
description: Where Is Cub? tells the story of a mother bear who awakens to find her cub missing. She visits several animal friends to learn if they have seen the little bear. Finally, she asks a buzzing bee. The bee has indeed seen her cub and is not at all happy about it. Strong illustrations support the story structure.
